## tri3 variable

Applies `p` to the three input values `x y z`<!-- -->, then same with `q`<!-- -->, and finally with `r`<!-- -->.

( x y z p q r -- pxyz qxyz rxyz )

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tri3: import("./api").StackFn
```
